18991.en:
We will now begin the second round. Participating will be three groups of lovable idiots who pratfall even when
they're adrift at sea!
18991.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>「では　これより２次予選を始める。
　参加するのは　海で漂流してる時でも
　ボケまくる　愛すべきバカの３組じゃ！<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
18991.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>: 그럼 지금부터 2차 예선을 시작하겠다.
　참가자는 바다에서 표류할 때도
　슬랩스틱을 멈추지 않는 사랑스러운 바보 3팀!<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
18991.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>第２轮预赛现在开始。
参加比赛的是就算在海上漂流，
也不会忘记搞笑的３组可爱傻瓜！<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
18991.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>那麼，現在開始第２輪預賽。
參加比賽的是就算在海上漂流，
也不會忘記搞笑的３組可愛傻瓜！<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>

18992.en:
<start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>The two most interesting pairs will
advance to the finals! The theme for
the second round is.<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
18992.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>「このうち　面白かった２組が
　決勝戦に進出とする！
　２次予選の　お題は……。<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
18992.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>: 이 중에서 가장 웃긴 2팀이
　결승전에 진출하게 될 것이다!
　2차 예선의 주제는…….<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
18992.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>其中最可笑的２组
将进入决赛！
第２轮预赛的题目是……<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
18992.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>其中表演得最有趣的２組
將進入決賽！
第２輪預賽的題目是……<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>

18993.en:
<start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>I'm going to do something interesting
with the image of this golden statue!
See you!<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
18993.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>「この黄金の像から　イメージして
　何か　面白いことをする！　じゃ！<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
18993.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>: 이 황금 조각상으로
　뭔가 웃긴 걸 하기!<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
18993.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>以这个黄金像为主题，
做一些搞笑的事情！现在开始！<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
18993.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>以這個黃金雕像為主題，
做一些搞笑的事情！現在開始！<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>

18994.en:
<start_lip_sync n00305 _normal m00001>Wooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo
oooooooooooooooooooooooo! The second
round is not that difficult either!<stop_lip_animation n00305 CLOSE_MOUTH>
18994.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00305 _normal m00001>「ウオオオオーーーッ！！

18994.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00305 _normal m00001>: 우와아아아아아아!!

18994.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00305 _normal m00001>噢噢噢噢！！

18994.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00305 _normal m00001>唔喔喔喔喔────！！

18995.en:
<start_lip_sync n00325 _normal m00001>This will be a legend in the comedy
world!<stop_lip_animation n00325 CLOSE_MOUTH>

18995.ko: <start_lip_sync n00325 _normal m00001>: 개그계에 전설이 태어나겠는걸!<stop_lip_animation n00325 CLOSE_MOUTH>
18995.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00325 _normal m00001>这下子会载入搞笑界史册了！<stop_lip_animation n00325 CLOSE_MOUTH>
18995.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00325 _normal m00001>這下子搞笑界就要出現傳說了！<stop_lip_animation n00325 CLOSE_MOUTH>

18996.en:
<start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>Torina Number 2! I'm going to make a

18996.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>「エントリーナンバー２！

18996.ko:

18996.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>２号参赛者！
一生专注活跃气氛！
普库莱特村的疯狂艺人！夫普！！<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>
18996.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>２號參賽者！
一生專注活躍氣氛！

18997.en:
<start_lip_sync n00303 _normal m00001>Ah! My precious golden statue has
fallen!<stop_lip_animation n00303 CLOSE_MOUTH>
18997.ja: <start_lip_sync n00303 _normal m00001>「あーっ！　ボクの大事な黄金像が倒れてる！<stop_lip_animation n00303 CLOSE_MOUTH>
18997.ko: <start_lip_sync n00303 _normal m00001>: 아앗! 내 소중한 황금 조각상이 넘어졌잖아!<stop_lip_animation n00303 CLOSE_MOUTH>
18997.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00303 _normal m00001>啊！我心爱的黄金像倒在地上！<stop_lip_animation n00303 CLOSE_MOUTH>
18997.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00303 _normal m00001>啊──！我心愛的黃金雕像倒在地上！<stop_lip_animation n00303 CLOSE_MOUTH>

18998.en:
<start_lip_sync n00303 _normal m00001>I can't believe they would treat a
precious golden statue like this!
Damn! You!<stop_lip_animation n00303 CLOSE_MOUTH>
18998.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00303 _normal m00001>「大事な黄金像を　こんな風に扱うなんて！

18998.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00303 _normal m00001>: 소중한 황금 조각상을 이렇게 다루다니!
　떼끼~! 이놈!<stop_lip_animation n00303 CLOSE_MOUTH>
18998.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00303 _normal m00001>这么对待我心爱的黄金像！
可恶！你！<stop_lip_animation n00303 CLOSE_MOUTH>
18998.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00303 _normal m00001>居然這麼對待我心愛的黃金雕像！
可惡！你這傢伙！<stop_lip_animation n00303 CLOSE_MOUTH>

18999.en:
<start_lip_sync n00303 _normal m00001>You... You... You... You... You...

18999.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00303 _normal m00001>你完蛋了……<stop_lip_animation n00303 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001.en:
The venue was filled with friendly
laughter.

19001.zh-Hant: 會場籠罩在一片和睦的笑聲中。

19002.en: <start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>We talk in the Danger Zone!<stop_lip_animation n00300 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19004.en:
<start_lip_sync n00306 _normal m00001>The other day... A new teacher came to
our school.<stop_lip_animation n00306 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19004.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00306 _normal m00001>「こないだなー。うちの学校に
　新任の先生　来たんだよ。<stop_lip_animation n00306 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19004.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00306 _normal m00001>: 얼마 전에 우리 학교에
　새로운 선생님이 왔어.<stop_lip_animation n00306 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19004.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00306 _normal m00001>前几天呐。
我们学校来了位新老师。<stop_lip_animation n00306 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19004.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00306 _normal m00001>前幾天啊，
我們學校來了位新老師。<stop_lip_animation n00306 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19005.en: <start_lip_sync n00307 _normal m00001>Heh. What kind of teacher?<stop_lip_animation n00307 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19005.ja: <start_lip_sync n00307 _normal m00001>「へー。どんな先生？<stop_lip_animation n00307 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19005.ko: <start_lip_sync n00307 _normal m00001>: 그래? 어떤 선생님인데?<stop_lip_animation n00307 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19005.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00307 _normal m00001>哦，新老师怎么样？<stop_lip_animation n00307 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19005.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00307 _normal m00001>喔，新老師怎麼樣？<stop_lip_animation n00307 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19006.en:
<start_lip_sync n00306 _normal m00001>That's the thing. He keeps raising his
hand, and he doesn't talk at all.<stop_lip_animation n00306 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19006.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00306 _normal m00001>「それがなー。ずっと　手ぇあげてて
　しかも　全然　話さへんねん。<stop_lip_animation n00306 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19006.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00306 _normal m00001>: 그게, 계속 손을 든 채로
　한 마디도 안 하지 뭐야.<stop_lip_animation n00306 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19006.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00306 _normal m00001>这个么——手一直举着，
而且几乎不说话。<stop_lip_animation n00306 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19006.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00306 _normal m00001>這個嘛──就是一直舉著手，
而且完全不說話。<stop_lip_animation n00306 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19007.ja: <start_lip_sync n00307 _normal m00001>「うんうん。<stop_lip_animation n00307 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19007.ko: <start_lip_sync n00307 _normal m00001>: 응, 응.<stop_lip_animation n00307 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19008.en:
<start_lip_sync n00306 _normal m00001>And what's more, it's kind of shiny
looking.<stop_lip_animation n00306 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19008.ja: <start_lip_sync n00306 _normal m00001>「しかもな　なんか見た目キンピカやねん。<stop_lip_animation n00306 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19008.ko: <start_lip_sync n00306 _normal m00001>: 게다가 피부가 번쩍번쩍해.<stop_lip_animation n00306 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19008.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00306 _normal m00001>而且呢，一眼看上去还金光闪闪的。<stop_lip_animation n00306 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19008.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00306 _normal m00001>而且呢，一眼看上去還金光閃閃的。<stop_lip_animation n00306 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19009.en: <start_lip_sync n00307 _normal m00001>Oh, really? Really?<stop_lip_animation n00307 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19009.ja: <start_lip_sync n00307 _normal m00001>「えー。ほんまなんー？<stop_lip_animation n00307 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19009.ko: <start_lip_sync n00307 _normal m00001>: 우와, 진짜?<stop_lip_animation n00307 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19009.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00307 _normal m00001>诶——真的吗？<stop_lip_animation n00307 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19009.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00307 _normal m00001>咦──真的嗎──？<stop_lip_animation n00307 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19010.en:
<start_lip_sync n00306 _normal m00001>Oh, the teacher just came, I'll
introduce you. Sensei! Look, this is
the new teacher.<stop_lip_animation n00306 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19010.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00306 _normal m00001>「あ　ちょうど先生来たから　紹介したるわー。

19010.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00306 _normal m00001>: 아, 마침 저기 오시니 소개해 줄게.

19010.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00306 _normal m00001>啊，正好新老师过来了，我给你介绍一下。

19010.zh-Hant:

老師──！來，這位就是新老師。<stop_lip_animation n00306 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19011.en:
<start_lip_sync n00307 _normal m00001>You're the new teacher? You're the new
teacher?<stop_lip_animation n00307 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19011.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00307 _normal m00001>「……って　お前。

新老师……<stop_lip_animation n00307 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19012.en: <start_lip_sync n00307 _normal m00001>A female teacher, huh?<stop_lip_animation n00307 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19012.ja: <start_lip_sync n00307 _normal m00001>「女の先生かい！<stop_lip_animation n00307 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19012.ko: <start_lip_sync n00307 _normal m00001>: 여자 선생님이었냐!?<stop_lip_animation n00307 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19012.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00307 _normal m00001>原來是女的嗎！<stop_lip_animation n00307 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19013.en: <start_lip_sync n00306 _normal m00001>That's the point I'm trying to make!<stop_lip_animation n00306 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19013.ja: <start_lip_sync n00306 _normal m00001>「ツッコむとこ　そこかい！<stop_lip_animation n00306 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19013.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00306 _normal m00001>你在乎的是這個啊！<stop_lip_animation n00306 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19014.ja: 会場は　爆笑の渦に包まれた！

19015.en:
<start_lip_sync n00324 _normal m00001>Yeah, it's good for killing time. It's

19015.ja: <start_lip_sync n00324 _normal m00001>「うん。ヒマつぶしには　ちょうどいいね。<stop_lip_animation n00324 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19015.ko: <start_lip_sync n00324 _normal m00001>: 뭐, 심심풀이로는 괜찮네.<stop_lip_animation n00324 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19016.en:
<start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>The brilliance of a silver star is

深藏不露的光华！

19017.en:
<start_lip_sync n00312 _normal m00001>Hoppupu. 75 years old. Single. Admires
Sir Man o' War.<stop_lip_animation n00312 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19017.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00312 _normal m00001>「ホッププ。７５歳。独身。

19017.ko:

19023.en:
<start_lip_sync n00300 _normal m00001>Hmm! He combined ''helpless'' with ''no
